name: Gudbrand
description:
Controls: WASD - Move  //  Left Mouse Click - Attack // Hold Right Mouse Button - Block

An action adventure taking place in a part of hell where demonic creatures and dark forces reign. The hero Gudbrand wants to redeem himself of his past sins through a series of trials that will challenge his wit, vigor and might.

This is an early prototype of an action adventure game made during a 48 hour GameJam. We wanted to show how much can be done in such small time. The game includes detailed melee combat with block and combo mechanics. Includes 5 different types of enemies ranged and melee and has a fully featured taunting end game boss with lots of different types of attacks. The game also has a dark theme and custom made amazing ambient sounds and soundtracks that reflects the nature of this devilish environment in the depths of hell.
